column1: Homelessness duties owed by London boroughs (2024 Q2)

column9: Assessed as not being owed a duty
column10: Assessed as not being owed a duty (per 1,000 households)

column1: Note: Some households owed a main duty were previously owed prevention or relief duties, so to avoid double-counting, these figures should not be added up. Four quarter averages have been used to account for seasonality and missing data.
Data source: Initial assessments of statutory homelessness duties owed, Department for Levelling Up, Housing & Communities and Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government
London's Poverty Profile is created by charitable funder Trust for London, and economic and public policy consultancy, WPI Economics
